task.title: View Global Metrics
task.shortdesc: View summary information about users and the content residing on your system in the Global Metrics pane of the System Metrics page.

step.cmd: Open the System Metrics screen, by clicking the System Metrics icon in the left navigation bar.

info.p: The System Metrics page opens showing the Global Metrics pane and the Data Source Metrics tab.

In the Users column, you can see how many users are currently created for the system, sorted by user role. In the Content column, you can see how much used and free space there is on the system, as well as the number of objects the system is currently storing and the number of data sources that have been configured.
